# Rotting Curse of Urfestra (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Curse Spells|curse]], [[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[Corrupt Spells|Corrupt 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 6]], [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Corrupt

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC), pg. 103

The subjectâ€™s flesh and bones begin to rot. The subject takes 1d6 points of Constitution damage immediately, and a further 1d6 points of Constitution damage every hour until the subject dies or the curse is removed with a *[[Wish (Spell)|wish]]**,* *[[Miracle (Spell)|miracle]]**,* or *[[Remove Curse (Spell)|remove curse]]* spell.

*Corruption Cost:* 1d6 points of Strength damage.

GM Note

*House Rule:* Added curse to the descriptor.
